item.title: Automatically update the titles in your Youtube videos.
item.description: Magic video The idea of changing the title of the youtube video automatically seems insane to me. There is a tutorial about how to achieve this feat is thoroughly done by Amit Agarwaal. The original concept was by Tom Scott. This article is all about the implementation of the same in my video. Youtube api and Google scripts are primarily responsible for this weird feat. Most of the contents of this article are from labnol.
